remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihmeetlem6.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem6.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem6.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem6.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem6.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem6.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem6 $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ Q .<_ X ) ) -> -. ( X ./\ ( Y .\/ Q ) ) .<_ W ) $.
